# Set up our dataset. Source: Kaggle
```{r}
rm(list=ls())
student_performance <- read.csv("Student_Performance.csv", header = TRUE)
```

# Basic EDA
```{r}
summary(student_performance)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

histogram <- ggplot(data = student_performance, aes(x = Performance.Index)) + 
  geom_histogram()

# Display the histogram
print(histogram)
```
